about.title: {{ProdShortName}} info
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust solution designed for documents manipulation. It supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Images, Archives, etc. Combine, split, extract, swap, remove and other operations are provided.

more_features.title: Document combining tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is able to manipulate by more than 50 popular business file formats. Wide range of document operations is supported.

feature_1.title: Merging different docs
feature_1.content: Combine or join document formats like PDFs, Word, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and more. Use options to restrict pages to be processed.

feature_2.title: Manipulate with pages
feature_2.content: You can easily move, remove, or even swap selected pages to adjust business document content to your needs.

feature_3.title: Change pages appearance
feature_3.content: It is possible to rotate any page to provided degree. Moreover you can change pages orientation like landscape or portrait for some document types.

feature_4.title: One more feature is pages extraction
feature_4.content: Extract particular pages and save them as a brand new file or document.

formats.title: Merge files of various formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} is able to process over 50 file formats. Manipulate your business document in any supported way using efficient tools.
